name: A Musical Hastilude
description:
Albus Goldfinger is a humble musician. Will he be able to defeat the competitors and marry the princess?

A simple card game where you combine musical notes and make the perfect tune to beat the rivals.

How to Play:

Drag a card. 

Place it in the placeholder.

Drag more cards to join musical notes and make a melody. 

Bummer: Some combos have cooldown.

Good melody damages the competitor.

That's how you play.

Game by: 

Markositta: Music

Panda-bear2: Graphics

Sepray: Programming

Zequals: Audio and SFX

Matherpl: Programming and Design
